EmailTemplate.subject: Are you grooving with Pivotal Support?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In this age of information overload, it is essential to have a single source that offers all relevant Pivotal knowledge, product updates, support services, and more. The Pivotal Support Update <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/227022067]]> is just that!
Knowledge is power and we believe in sharing We have some audacious stats in that our Knowledge Base views have DOUBLED over the past year!! Our Knowledge Base is built on the Knowledge Centered Support (KCS) philosophy of delivering timely info and we love to share our knowledge with you <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/227022067#kcs]]>.
Top Knowledge Base articles Weâ€™ve handpicked the top Knowledge Base articles <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/227022067#topten]]> which address the topics that you most want to know about.
Keep up with the latest Find out the latest on Major Releases <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/227022067#updates]]>, Support News <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/227022067#news]]>, Social Media <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/227022067#social]]>, Events <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/227022067#events]]>, and the Pivotal Academy's <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/227022067#academy]]> newest offerings. We also have a new section, Meet Your Support Expert <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/227022067#name]]>.
Head to your Pivotal Support Update <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/227022067]]> for all of this and more.
We value your feedback <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/PivotalSupportUpdate]]>. Let us know if there is something you would like to see in the next issue.
Kind regards, The Pivotal Support Team
